dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Why Apple Stock Gained 30% Last Year
News Content: Investors are plowing into this popular name in anticipation of its next long-lived growth run.

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.75, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.25
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: -1, Prediction of stock price falling: -1
Round: 1
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.45
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.7, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.3
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.65, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.35
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.8, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.2
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.8, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.2


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

{
"reasoning": "The news headline 'Why Apple Stock Gained 30% Last Year' suggests a positive trend for Apple's stock, indicating that investors are optimistic about the company's future growth. The previous predictions from various models show a general consensus that the stock price is likely to rise, with most models predicting a higher probability of the stock price rising than falling. The trend of predictions across rounds also shows a slight increase in the predicted probability of the stock price rising, with some models revising their predictions upwards in the second round. Taking into account the positive news headline and the overall trend of predictions, I estimate that the probability of the stock price rising is higher than the probability of it falling.",
"company_name": "Apple Inc.",
"company_symbol": "AAPL",
"news_headline": "Why Apple Stock Gained 30% Last Year",
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.8,
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.2
}
